website_summaries.verdict: Very accurate tax preparation software. However, filers with complex tax situations, such as investors, may want to opt for Premium.
pros: Automatically downloads W-2s and 1099s from many companies
Can import previous year’s data from other tax prep brands like TurboTax
Generally up to date on 2017 tax rules
cons: Many buyers are unaware that Deluxe comes in 2 versions: either with 1 state package included or federal only
Software updates can be slow and may glitch, requiring repeat downloads
Investors or those with more complex tax situations may be frustrated

customer_reviews.title: Be ware before clicking the submit button.
customer_reviews.text: I was very upset with myself and the Amazon site. I don't use the Mac version. Your website defaults to the Mac version. I didn't pay close enough attention and clicked submit order. After downloading and find my error. I tried to find a way to cancel my order. I kept getting a message that electronic versions are final and not refunded. I ended up paying for a software product that I cannot use. I don't like the idea that I can't talk to a person. I think that there should be a short period of time that allows an order to be cancelled.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Soares

customer_reviews.title: The Software does not Work on My MAC which has the High Sierra Operating System.
customer_reviews.text: Unable to load onto my desk IMAC. H&R Block help desk will not help me. They know nothing about Apple products. Stop selling this software to people who use MACS.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Downloaded, installed and activated fine on Mac OS 10.10.5
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all. Every year people complain about the $20 state e-file (price info clearly printed on the packaging) and inability to file ultra early because updates (which the feds and states have to make available to software manufacturers) aren't available. Sheesh! If you don't like the $20 state e-file fee, print your return and give your money to the post office.
customer_reviews.author: Sam1

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the negative reviews. Software doesn't download on my iMac even though it is a new iMac with latest operating system.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kramberg

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive tax software
customer_reviews.text: I have used H&R Block Tax Software on a Mac for 6 years. I have never had a problem with it- either loading it from a disc or downloading it online. There are several negative reviews here on getting the program installed on a Mac. Amazon doesn't have the role of getting the program to run. Block may be of some help. However, Apple has fantastic technical support. So download this program and direct any problems in installing to Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Cazier

customer_reviews.title: Please don't change over
customer_reviews.text: I decide for price I would go with this software changing from the higher price Turbo Tax. Because of this stupid mistake I will buy both. This software is not as easy to use as turbo tax, harder to maneuver, and more difficult to tell where you are and it doesn't import in the way expected Turbo Tax files of the past years requiring manual data enter anyway. Turbo Tax YOU don't have this problem. The saving difference is not worth the change.
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: More buggy software compared to previous years
customer_reviews.text: I've been using H&R Block Mac software to file my taxes for over 5 years now. Overall been a great software to use for the price but this year was much more buggy. Even though I inputted my activation code...it didn't allow me to activate and didn't load my 2018 (H&R block file) well. There were errors in my load of 2018 tax information that required me to manually look through my 2018 information and input to pass their checks. This is the first year using the software that I don't fully trust they processed my taxes correctly. I think it will be fine but there were too many bugs in this release...
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for year-end tax planning (no state forms yet)
customer_reviews.text: If you're buying early to do end of year tax planning in December, this won't work. Although preliminary federal forms are available, the H&R Block Tax Software won't even attempt to do state taxes before January 10 of next year. The state forms just aren't available, not even a preliminary version. (I've always used TurboTax in the past, and they have preliminary state forms available in December. Sure, with lots of warnings that things may change in the final forms, but they're usually close enough to be decent planning tools.)
customer_reviews.author: M. Edmunds

customer_reviews.title: Don't attempt download version on Mac
customer_reviews.text: I have repeatedly tried to install software for two days now and have not been able to do so. I have tried all the suggested fixes to make it work. I am working on a brand new macbook pro with Mac Os Catalina. The only reason for not using a cd disk is that the new macs don't come with a disk drive. Oh well I guess I am out of $35.
customer_reviews.author: George M. Ray

customer_reviews.title: download does not work on new iMac
customer_reviews.text: This version of H&R Block tax software will not load onto any new Mac running Catalina. I contacted H&R Block and they sent me 2 alternate versions that also would not instal on my computer. I bought the disc based version of H&R Block tax software and it also would not work. I had used H&R Block Deluxe version software for the past 3 years but 2019 did not work. I tried Turbo Tax and it installed properly.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Schommer

customer_reviews.title: STATE EFILE NOT INCLUDED ENDS UP ANOTHER $20
customer_reviews.text: I've used HR block for years, never had nearly this many problems. First one entire page wasn't accessible until middle of Feb so I couldn't file until they got around to releasing an update. Tech support doesn't seem to work on my MAC at all, had to spend 30 min on hold with them to have no real help. The biggest watch out is that this particular software does NOT include state efile. Just includes the download to process the state.
customer_reviews.author: J klok

customer_reviews.title: It could have been a good purchase, but... Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, taxes are difficult to do. This product walks you through the process, but it's still complicated. I understand that taxes are complicated and that isn't the fault of the product. What REALLY annoyed me is that while this is in the advertisement "State e-file available for 19.95 Dollar'; It is sort of hidden and not something that you would easily notice. IMHO, this extra charge should be very clear in the advertisement of the product. Basically, it gets the job done, but after you spend five or six hours figuring everything out, you get this nice surprise of having to spend an extra $19.95. My candid review, it works, but buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Candid Reviews By Steve

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy and doesn't get you as much money as TurboTax...
customer_reviews.text: H&R Block didn't pull up the homestead deduction that TurboTax always did, so I had to go onto the government website and reenter all of the details and file that separately. I would've lost that money if I wouldn't have caught that. Also, this program isn't nearly as intuitive as TurboTax and also seems way buggier. Next year I'm paying a few bucks more and going back to what works best and gets me more money.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Taussig

customer_reviews.title: Works fine with one glitch though
customer_reviews.text: Wrote the 3 tax returns for the family without issues, until it decided to crash for a few times and would not open. The solution was to double click on the saved return and it worked fine after that. One thing that sometimes messed up in the past was to load investiment reports from Scottrade and I was even more concerned since it TD Ameritrade acquired Scottrade. No problem this time, went smoothly. So far so good.... I got all filed and waiting for the refunds now, yes !
customer_reviews.author: alexdelara

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Does Not Download to iMac (High Sierra OS Version 10.13.6)
customer_reviews.text: Paid for the software. Cannot download or use. Cannot get a refund. Other reviewers have posted issues with iMac High Sierra OS. Downloaded the software from the H&R Block site and it works just fine. Something is wrong with the download here. Intend to dispute the charge on my credit card, but in the time it has taken out of my day, I could have done my tax return with a pencil and paper.
customer_reviews.author: ELM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Taxes Since 1999
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this software, under different names, since 1999 (except for one year where it was not available for the Mac). We use the federal and state. Our federal has itemized returns. We use its e-file for the federal; so seamless and fast. We've never had any problems/issues. Had to use TurboTax the year this wasn't available; not nearly as easy and reliable. Note: We don't use it to e-file the state at a cost, but instead enter it's data on our state's e-file Web site.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Software Not Ready for Immediate Use
customer_reviews.text: The first step after downloading the software is to Register and Activate; however, clicking on "Activate Now" would not work in spite of repeated uninstalling and reinstalling the software. I called HR Block at 888 482 9288 (from Read Me) and spoke to a very helpful agent who told me not to worry for now and to click on "Activate Later" and proceed with the return. Activation would be possible later, indicating that the software provided was not supported at the present time!
customer_reviews.author: Rookie

customer_reviews.title: I’m Completely Frustrated with this Software
customer_reviews.text: GRRR! After spending umpteen hours filing in my tax hours and making revisions I finally got to the end to e-file and it told me I still need to pay $20 to file my state tax return. THATS WHY I PAID FOR THE ACTIVATION CODE THAT INCLUDES THE STATE RETURN!!! This is so erroneous. And then I tried to call support and after being on the phone for 15 mins, the automated voice estimated that I have another 60 minutes in wait time. WHAT??? Just horrible experience all around.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to download and use on MAC; cost for 2nd state is high
customer_reviews.text: This is my 7th year using this version of H&R Block's tax software. I have never had any issues downloading or running it (currently on MAC OS High Sierra 10.13.6), or using it to submit tax returns online. I subtracted a star because the cost for a second state program seems unreasonably high: $39.95. My purchase price for the entire package (which includes one state program) was $34.95. So, if one needs a second state program, I guess it makes sense to just purchase a second full package.
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: 2019 is junk on my MacPro
customer_reviews.text: H&R 2019 locked me out of using the state program apparently because it couldn't find last year's state data. This is the last year I buy this crappy software. Next year will be Turbo Tax for sure, and I might even have to buy TT 2019 just to finish up this years return. Update: bought TurboTax Deluxe yesterday. Paid full price. Don’t care. Wasted a week trying to get H&R to work. No go. Even the “Help” link is broken and goes nowhere. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Typical fraudulent H&R Block
customer_reviews.text: This is a fraudulent product. It says it includes the state return, but that does not mean e-file, literally just sending a digital message over the internet and they want $20 more for that. And the software will try to up-sell you a more advanced versions even before knowing whether it is even necessary. I have H&R a chance and I should have known better that this smarmy sleaziest of the utterly immoral industry is up to it’s not good practices in the digital world too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cogliano

customer_reviews.title: Easy software to use
customer_reviews.text: Second year using H&R Block at home software to prepare taxes.. Your prompted to enter numbers as you progress through the tax firm At the end you have a review.. software does accuracies checks to confirm an questions or incorrect entries.. The next select which state you are filing form...software will populate information from your federal into your state.. Then just exile both... you will receive confirmation that both federal and state have been accepted...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning - Don't expect any support, even when the software fails with a clear bug
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the deluxe+state version, but when I want to download the state it asks me for $40. The only support option is to wait on the phone for hours, so I decided to pay the $40. Next year I'm going back to turbo-tax. I've been using this software for years and this has never happened to me. I'm absolutely certain this was not operator error, but for some reason the software did not want to provide the promised state version.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Adar

customer_reviews.title: Double charge for state program
customer_reviews.text: Shame I can't give zero stars. Purchased Deluxe + State but when I get to the state tab, it doesn't recognize that it was included in my download and wants to charge me another $39.99 for my first and only state program. Going into "help center" and clicking on "chat for support" does nothing; seems to be a fake button. No doubt I'll have to resort to calling customer service which, by the way, is holding 50+ minutes right now.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: It's tax software...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this software for over 2 decades. Let's face it, you are either the person who does their own taxes or someone who takes the shoe box to the accountant. What I like best about this software is that I can download it from Amazon as a digital purchase and have access to pervious years purchases in my Amazon digital software library. Amazon has the best price and the Amazon gift card offer when you use your federal tax refund to purchase an Amazon gift card, is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Westfielder

customer_reviews.title: Would not Recommend:  Software won't install on Mac/Mojave OS
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to use this software. I downloaded and installed it, but when I try to open it, I get a message saying: Initialization Failed - Exception thrown - creating a directory in the following path /User/Shared/H&R Block/2019 failed. It suggests checking permissions for the directories, which I have done to no avail, having tried suggestions also from other users facing the same problem. The H&R Block website is of no help and does not offer a chat function. So far, this has been a waste of money. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anne K

customer_reviews.title: Software doesn't work as downloaded
customer_reviews.text: There is something wrong with the software I downloaded from Amazon. It will not activate. I contacted Amazon and they said contact HR Block. I contacted HR Block and they said it is something wrong with the software download I was sold and to contact Amazon. Instead of giving me another copy to download, I am stuck in this loop when in reality, I just want to work on my taxes which isn't fun to do anyways. Now I am going to have to purchase another copy of the software but it won't be from Amazon and it won't be HR Blocks...
customer_reviews.author: Mom to 2

customer_reviews.title: Where did my tax return go?
customer_reviews.text: Always do my own taxes with H&R and got this one thinking it was the same. I input my data and got ready to file then my return went away. I did say that I wanted to save it on some secure place and paid extra for that but then could not get it back so I could do state and file both. I downloaded from H&R itself and was successful in filing fed and state. I would like a refund please.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS MOST LIKELY THE ONE YOU WANT
customer_reviews.text: This is the one you want if you have fairly straightforward taxes and are a homeowner. While I consider it critically important that you understand how to do your own taxes so that you know how it all works, I have found using software to be a real timesaver. Most of the time. There are endless pages of questions, most of which are irrelevant, and that gets to be a bit cumbersome. But overall, I wouldn't go back to doing it the old-fashioned way.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDenizen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy, convenience fee costs more than program
customer_reviews.text: I’m not great at doing my taxes but this program made it pretty easy, I used a 2019 MacBook Air. The program was $35 but the “free” federal e filing had a $45 convenience fee, which was lame. I’d rather have known that in advance then been surprised after going through all the motions . That said, it was still cheaper than taking them somewhere and I had some extra time to spare during quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: 10th Year in a row using this program
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this program for 10 years now. I find it easy to maneuver and the drop down menus are easy to follow. I have had a CPA review my return a few times and they have yet to find any additional credits... I appreciate that it quickly finds last years return and uploads it into the program. I am able to complete the entire process in about an hour or so. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: If you get a child tax credit it won't let you file until 2/15/20, and locks up your state too
customer_reviews.text: I got all the way until the end, and put in my efile info and got an error. After 2 calls I come to find out that if you use their software and are getting the child tax credit it won't let you file until February 15th, and that also locks up your State taxes too. It won't let you file your State taxes until the federal is filed. I'm super mad, and now stuck waiting or using another venue and paying again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Merchant

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well For Me
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for me on an iMac running OS Mojave 10.14.6. A minor glitch downloading was resolved quickly and easily by Amazon Tech Support (they are good and personable). O.K., H&R Block is not quite as slick as Turbo Tax (which I had been using for many years) but it does the job just as well, for about a third of the price, and you don't have to update to the latest OS (like you do with Turbo Tax). I am probably a convert going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Tax software works well as always, but there's an installation catch for Mac OS
customer_reviews.text: The description says "Platform: Mac OS X 10.9 Mavericks, Mac OS Catalina 10.15 " They're not kidding. I had Mojave, which is 10.14, and it would not activate because some UI buttons didn't work in the intermediate version. I upgraded to 10.15, which I had avoided because it required converting to APFS and losing 32 bit games, and it worked. Based on my experience, don't assume it will work on Mac OS X 10.10, 10.11, 10.12, 10.13.
customer_reviews.author: John Light

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work on iMac with Catalina.
customer_reviews.text: Tried several time to load this software and each time there was an installation failure. Called H&R Block and the technician could not help but said I should receive a call back within 48 hours. I have not got that call back. Tried their chat feature and was referred to a third party answering service that charged a fee. I was told that the fee was refundable but this is a poor way to support your produce. I have used H&R Block for several years but I think this will be the last. Also, the software is not refundable even it it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard L Tucker

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON Version cannot connect to H&R Block server
customer_reviews.text: had to get a one time version of the software from H&R Block to complete e-filing. Amazon version could not connect to H&R Block server(s). Tried a second download, redid the return, same result. Maybe because I would not select the AMAZON card from refund offer? No software support from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hayes

customer_reviews.title: No more Turbo Tax
customer_reviews.text: I've used turbo tax for years. This year I was half way through and it froze up, and nothing I tried was a fix. I bought H&R Block for the first time and it worked flawlessly. Needless to say, next year it's H&R Block for me.
customer_reviews.author: William Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Poor Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: After using HR Block tax software for over 10 years, this is the first time I've had both the State and IRS make corrections. It wasn't a large error, and due to being owed money back, it didn't result in any penalties. However, if I hadn't been owed money back, things would have been a different story.
customer_reviews.author: NoFear_2008

customer_reviews.title: Switched from turbo tax!!!! Very happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Switch from turbo tax to H&R because turbo tax had a known error that they would not fix in their program that kept miscalculating my deductions.... Very happy with h&r!!!! And the software was $30 cheaper than turbo tax!!!
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.  Pay more if you have to and use something else.
customer_reviews.text: Submitted my taxes and the status still shows "Pending" after two weeks. Called because a pop-up told me to and once I navigated the phone tree, spoke to the wrong person, went back on hold for 35 minutes, I still don't know what to do. (Looks like I'll just print it out and send it in.) Back to "Turbo Tax" for me next year!
customer_reviews.author: James S. Arcara

customer_reviews.title: Data transferable year to year
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for past 7 years Previous years data can transfer but only if saved correctly which I have had considerable difficulty achieving Sometimes have to retype all addresses and numbers from W2’s again which is so frustrating It’s me not the product Just do it right
customer_reviews.author: BabyRN

customer_reviews.title: Always works every year!
customer_reviews.text: 7th year if purchasing the software thru amazon and it never fails. Easy to install and complete your taxes once you allow the govt. to update software accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: XP1083

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with Mac OS Catalina
customer_reviews.text: I have used H&R Block software successfully since 2015. However, the 2019 version would not work with Mac OS Catalina. When I tried to use the product I received the following notice "Exception thrown during initialization: Creating a directory in the following path /Users/Shared/H&R Block/2019 failed. Check permissions and ownership of those directories. in MacFileWriterImpl::openInMode" I contacted the H&R Block customer service 2 times unsuccessfully. First time they sent me their "script' with directions to solve the problem. These directions were for previous operating systems and did not solve the problem. Two weeks later I am still waiting for there return call with a resolve. Skip this product
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Big Help!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to complete the Federal Taxes without any trouble. I had my Taxes done by my Tax Lady for years, so I had to enter everything. Yet, that was easy enough to complete. My issues was when I needed to download the one free State form. I was asked to pay. I contacted the tech support and they emailed me my State. Now, I am just waiting for the updates before I send in my Taxes.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Great program but need more than 5 e-files
customer_reviews.text: I have been using H&R Block for many years and am a very satisfied customer. Only issue I have is that my family all want me to do their taxes and I wish their was a way to purchase additional Federal e-files. The software limits the number of e-files to 5 for each copy of the software.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great software
customer_reviews.text: I have been using H&R Block software for the last 9 years and I love it. It is very accurate and I get those most of my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Unable to Efile
customer_reviews.text: I have used H&R Block Software for years, but I was unable to Efile or rate the product via the software. I received a message indicating; "Unable to Connect" because of a bad server certificate or incorrect computer date. I was told by their support agent that It was something wrong with my computer or the Safari Search Engine. However, I contacted the Apple Support for iMac who took me through numerous checks and indicated that there was nothing wrong with my computer or Safari. My conclusion is that the product that I downloaded from Amazon does not work, but I'm not able to receive a refund because my return period expired.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Absolute rubbish
customer_reviews.text: It literally cannot handle a 2-state tax return. 1. You cannot add a pdf file with previous year tax return generated online at the HRBlock webpage. 2. It says + State, but you actually have to pay for state return. It is another $20.
customer_reviews.author: Valentyn The Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over all good but missing import features for trading apps
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have auto import feature for Robinhood trading and you cannot even upload it. You have to manually enter each trade one by one.. very painful experience
customer_reviews.author: Sultan Mirza

customer_reviews.title: BE VERY CARFULL. You might end up with the WRONG SOFTWARE like I did.
customer_reviews.text: I bought H&R Block Software this AM. The software said MAC and Windows. I clicked and the next window had download but did not ask for a choice. I now have a MAC program that will not work on WINDOWS PC. I can't get a LIVE person to talk to me.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended, Bugs
customer_reviews.text: Software has bug that messing up names and SSN in the forms, state tax has wrong calculation with the disability income, spent much time working on it still not able to get it right, eventually switch to TurboTax which has no issues at all. It’s non refundable, so It’s waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: H&R Block Deluxe Charges for Federal E-filing
customer_reviews.text: Beware that H&B Block Deluxe will charge you for Federal e-filing. The Deluxe software says 5 free Federal e-filings but watch your credit card account--H&R Block will charge you. Calling and talking to H&R Block is a series of people who cannot help and will transfer you in circles to departments that all say it is not their responsibility.
customer_reviews.author: markcc

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't include State like the description says
customer_reviews.text: Requires $19.95 to file state, contacted H&R Block, and they said, unfortunately, there is no such thing as a Delux with 1 state.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine on Mac. Double check it’s work :)
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mac with Mojave and worked fine. Every year I read terrible reviews about Mac support but always just works for me. Maybe I’m lucky dunno. I manually check everything as seen issues with H&R in past but gets job done.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus G

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but effective.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do what needs to be done for much less than competing products.
customer_reviews.author: Philip H. Kozloff

customer_reviews.title: Would not complete the Downloaded to Mac (and yes I have the newest updates).
customer_reviews.text: Cannot review actually use-ability of the program but can review H & R Block customer service and program. Program would not complete the download from the amazon software library. Installed and uninstalled 5x. Called H & R Block customer service and was told too many calls ahead please try again later. Zippy support. Reached out to amazon, to ask for a refund and the complete opposite. Actual help! They wanted me to rebuy H & R Block again. Sorry but no thanks, I'll buy TurboTax. Amazon customer service 6stars..
customer_reviews.author: Matty D

customer_reviews.title: This year's software is VERY frustrating!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used H & R BLock tax software for many years. I have had so many problems with this year's version will likely be my last! I've had problems opening it. Having obtain infrom from last years form and now I'm questioning it's accuracy. Save yourself your frustration and DON"T buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: File will not download
customer_reviews.text: When transferring the file to applications the file shows as a read only and the error message is to put the file in the Applications folder (which is where it is located) Amazon has not been helpful in getting the file to work and has passed the problem off to the software manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been using this software for 10 years.
customer_reviews.text: This is my goto tax software. It's easy to use and very accurate. I've been using it for many years and I'm always happy with the results. I haven't used tech support, because I have never needed it. AAAAA
customer_reviews.author: Ron Pgh

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst tax software I've ever used - it has a habit of crashing, then showing a completely different refund status when you reopen it. Sometimes even viewing data I've previously entered causes it to recalculate to a different refund amount. I have zero faith that this is computing a correct tax return.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for H&R Block to release final software update
customer_reviews.text: I've been using H&R Block tax software since 2011. This year for some reason H&R Block still has not finished updating its software. Next update not scheduled for release until 5 March, no idea whether or not that will be the final one! Thus I am unable to file my state and federal tax returns, though I have completed entry of all my information in the software. Very annoying -- I need my state tax refund a.s.a.p., and can't yet file my returns.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Step by step handholding through the process
customer_reviews.text: This software walks you through the entire process, federal and state, and reminds you of things one would probably not realize. Very responsive software. Forms are available for review before filing. It's a confidence builder.
customer_reviews.author: dabrown

customer_reviews.title: Product name is confusing. Deluxe version doesn't include state return efile
customer_reviews.text: The product name makes me thing that it included the state return already. But looks like it only includes a download. I still have to pay for the state return when I efile it through this software. And it's not synced to the online version, which makes me unable to use what I have filled out there.
customer_reviews.author: hakuro

customer_reviews.title: Used for simple tax purposes & does the job
customer_reviews.text: Been using for simple tax returns for my parents. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: hr04

customer_reviews.title: BE WARNED
customer_reviews.text: After sending my taxes in the program sent back a message that the "e-file system was not working," it told me to check my forms and resubmit...I did...four times...then I tried again...you only get 5 e-files, so now i get to pay $10 per attempt (even when it its the program that is glitchy!). H&R Block, you just lost a customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Unable to e-file
customer_reviews.text: Tried numerous times to e-file this year's return with no success. Even tech support couldn't figure out how to e-file my return. Only recourse is to print and mail or try a different program. I'll be shifting back to TurboTax.
customer_reviews.author: D. Evans

customer_reviews.title: 7 years running
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to tax preparation software and the price fromAmazon is hard to beat
customer_reviews.author: R. Putman

customer_reviews.title: As always, worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: As always, H&R Block tax software works great. I run it on my Mac without any issues. It did not miss a beat wrt this year's extended filling deadline for to Corona....
customer_reviews.author: J. Polo

customer_reviews.title: Big help with taxes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tax software. I have been purchasing the deluxe version the past 5 years and have no complaints. Very good at handling the college student tax credit.
customer_reviews.author: John Q Public

customer_reviews.title: H&R Block STILL defaults to a (non-refundable) Mac version
customer_reviews.text: Why does this listing default to the O/S that 90% of us do not use, and for a product that is NON-REFUNDABLE on Amazon? 1) why is there a default O/S at all, instead of asking us to select one? 2) Is H&R Block doing it this way intentionally so they can sell a lot of unusable software, plus maybe a second copy for the correct O/S?
customer_reviews.author: Art C

customer_reviews.title: Bugs - Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded fine for the federal program. Received notification state was ready to download. Will not download correctly. Followed the prompts. I am really good at IT. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Unable to Open download
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 versions of HR Block 2019 Deluxe Program. One from Amazon, and one from HR Block. Both of them give me the same error message after attempting to open the installed download. I have a MAC OS Catalina 10.15.3, super frustrating. And neither version can be refunded, so I am out over $60 and still can't file my taxes. I have used HR Block downloads on my Mac for the past 10 years and never had this problem. Anyone have a solution, I'm open to suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the Mac version!
customer_reviews.text: I have the latest Mac OS Catalina on a new MacBook Pro and get an installation error. It is an hour wait for tech support. I will be demanding a refund and buying from someone else. I have used tax cut for over 8 years. This is pure trash and IT 101. Don't publish software that doesn't install seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Blake

customer_reviews.title: Better than paying HRB staff 5 times as much to do the exact same thing!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of paying almost $200 for HRB staff to do my simple tax returns. Now I get the same result/refund for less than 1/5 the price!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Tax Program
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this program for years. It is thorough, accurate, and simple to use; I've never been audited by the IRS while using H & R Block Tax Software Deluxe.
customer_reviews.author: Nothing Yonsen

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Download This Year's Version
customer_reviews.text: I am going to have to slug my way through this, but for the life of me I cannot get this to load from the library.
customer_reviews.author: Sheltonite

customer_reviews.title: VERY SORRY
customer_reviews.text: VERY SORRY was not able to file//////I entered all my info///when I printed the form all zeros ere printed. I had no chose but find some help, which cost me well over 100.00 .Please credit my account.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfred Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Watch out!!! >>>> MAC DOWNLOAD IS THE DEFAULT !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is idiotic since the majority of users are on Windows based systems... I know I know.. user error and all. You will NOT be able to get a refund or exchange. BUYER BEWARE... WATCH OUT for that default setting!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Easy program to use!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I struggle to install and open the tax softwear program but last year it was seamless!
customer_reviews.author: patricia clark

customer_reviews.title: Easy Money
customer_reviews.text: Easy as always. Use this software every year. Filing electronically a snap!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wcislo

customer_reviews.title: works but not as easy
customer_reviews.text: Product works fine to get me my tax refund but not as easy or intuitive vs competitors. Much cheaper so it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: tifa3

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get it to open.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a bad review initially. Software wouldn't open on my Mac. Took almost 10 minutes, but then it opened and worked normally. Still takes time to open after first time. but happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It was very to use
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing to dislike. I used this software to do my State and Federal taxes
customer_reviews.author: Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Problem fixed with help from HR Block support. Thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded today. Installed fine but won't allow me to import previous year's return. On hold for 1.5 hours trying to get HR Block to help. No way to spend a Friday night.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Yonan

customer_reviews.title: All i use
customer_reviews.text: About to finally do state taxes. Its my every year brand. Reasonable price and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Void

customer_reviews.title: Always my top pick
customer_reviews.text: H&R is always my top pick. Works well, find all the right deductions. Easiest to use.

customer_reviews.title: Works with macOS Catalina 10.15.3
customer_reviews.text: Read a bunch of reviews that said it didn't work with Macs, however it worked with macOS Catalina 10.15.3
customer_reviews.author: harribrob

customer_reviews.title: It appears that the state program is not included or does not work on my machine
customer_reviews.text: While using this software, I was prompted to pay $39.95 for the state program that was advertised as included in the price. I haven't been able to resolve the issue by calling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No problem to install on my MacBook
customer_reviews.text: The price was really good and the download/install went perfectly on my Mac. I’ve been using this tax software for almost 10 years and it’s always worked fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D from Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Wait until April
customer_reviews.text: I cant review this until after I have used it. Send another request in April.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Sky

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe version good for most taxpayers with extra types of income
customer_reviews.text: This software covers the needs of individuals with most forms of regular incomes. It picks up much of the information from the prior year so makes following one’s self easy. It’s relatively easy to find one's way around in the program but I “lost’ one area when I did not check the appropriate box. Worked fine when i did i correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use to complete your taxes
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the H & R software for the past decade to do my taxes. Excellent way to do them . The years that the were more complicated, I completed them and then took them to a local H & R office to check before mailing them. 2020 I purchased it from Amazon for my 2019 taxes as I have other items when their price has been the best.

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for Me!
customer_reviews.text: This software had no problems updating and was very easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Product says both federal and state. However, if you want to file state they charge extra. Would not have purchased if I knew

customer_reviews.title: Works...  it extra costs to file state
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Works as advertised, but having to pay to electronically file my state return is a little annoying.

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine on Mac Catalina
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have any issues on MacBook with latest version of Catalina. Not sure whether some of the reviews were dated or the problems have been fixed since then. Worked like any other year, was able to create multiple federal and state returns. Yes, there is a charge to efile for some states, nothing new with this version.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: The software is easy to install and use. The updates are coming in a timely fashion.

customer_reviews.text: The state tax would not load, tried several times! Wasted my money!

customer_reviews.title: BAD Deal

product_meta.title: H&R Block Tax Software Deluxe + State 2019 with 4% Refund Bonus Offer [Amazon Exclusive] [Mac Download]
product_meta.description:
Platform:Mac Download| Edition:Deluxe + StateH&R Block Deluxe Tax Software offers everything homeowners and investors need to easily complete federal and state taxes, including step-by-step guidance and FREE tax advice via onlace chat.

Minimum System Requirements:

 * Operating System: 10.9 Mavericks
 * Processor: 32-bit
feature_bullets: Five free federal e-files and unlimited federal preparation and printing
One state program download included - a $39.95 value
Guidance on maximizing mortgage interest and real estate tax deductions
Reporting assistance on income from investments, stock options, home sales, and retirement
Quickly import your W-2, 1099, 1098, last year's personal tax return
Free live product help via chat - or get tax help from a tax expert for a fee
Help Center has more than 13,000 articles, frequently asked questions, and tips in case you get stuck while preparing your taxes
Must allocate all or a portion of Federal refund to Amazon.com Gift Card to receive 4% Refund Bonus

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
